topic: Clarification on Master Seminar and Registration for Courses

correspondence.message: I am a student in the Masterâ€™s program in Information Systems and have questions regarding the Master Seminar on Federated Learning: whether its credits can be counted toward my program, and I also want guidance on registering for two courses due to my professor's recommendation and any limitations on taking multiple courses."

The seminar is part of your curriculum, so its credits count towards your program. For the courses, your professor can register you, and whether they count towards your degree depends on the module numbers in your study plan.
